summary: Backend API testing for Save Case Sheet type validation fix. All 12 tests passed - backend correctly accepts boolean fields (general_pallor, general_icterus, general_clubbing, general_lymphadenopathy) as true/false, cvs_pulse_rate as integer/null, and cvs_precordial_heave as string. Invalid types (string for boolean, empty string for integer) are properly rejected with 422 status.
passed_tests: POST /api/cases - Boolean fields (general_pallor, general_icterus, general_clubbing, general_lymphadenopathy) as false accepted
POST /api/cases - Boolean fields as true accepted
POST /api/cases - cvs_pulse_rate with various integers (60, 80, 100, 120, 150) accepted
POST /api/cases - cvs_precordial_heave with various strings ('Normal', 'Present', 'Absent', 'Not assessed', '') accepted
PUT /api/cases/{id} - Update examination with correct types accepted
POST /api/cases - String 'Absent' for boolean field correctly rejected with 422
POST /api/cases - Empty string for cvs_pulse_rate correctly rejected with 422
POST /api/cases - Boolean for string field behavior documented (coerced to string)
POST /api/cases - Complete examination payload with all fields accepted and persisted
critical_code_review_comments: Backend Examination model correctly defines: general_pallor (bool), general_icterus (bool), general_clubbing (bool), general_lymphadenopathy (bool), cvs_pulse_rate (Optional[int]), cvs_precordial_heave (str)
Pydantic validation properly rejects invalid types with 422 Unprocessable Entity
Mobile app fix (toBoolean, toIntOrNull, toStringOrEmpty helpers) should now work correctly with backend
seed_data_creation: Created multiple test cases with TEST_ prefix for type validation testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Examination field type validation is working correctly. Backend accepts: boolean fields as true/false, cvs_pulse_rate as integer or null, cvs_precordial_heave as string. Invalid types are rejected with 422. The mobile app fix with helper functions (toBoolean, toIntOrNull, toFloatOrNull, toStringOrEmpty) should now work correctly with the backend API.
